content: The Template (Seven Poems) Photo By Paul Brookes My Scarylife  Scaryborn to this world this scaryearth I scarylearned  in school, met a lasswho said she was scaryready  to be scarywed, so we scarymarried after three months of scarycourting She scarybore our first kidafter six months whilst I scaryworked  in scaryemployment scaryunexpectedscarypromoted to scarymanager  so we scarybought our first scaryhome,Scaryfurnitured it, after scarydecorating I had an scaryallottment where I scarygrew carrots and potatoes and cabbages She scarydied after seven years scaryfighting lung cancer. I never scaryremarried Scarybring up our second child,scarytell her scarystories of our scarylived scarylife My Freaklife Freakborn to this freakworldthis freakearth I freaklearned in school, met a lasswho said she was freakready to be freakwed, so we freakmarriedafter three months of freakcourting she freakbore our first kidafter six months whilst I freakworked in freakemployment freakexpected freakpromoted to freakmanager  so we freakbought our first freakhome,freakfurnitured it, after freakdecorating. I had a freakallottment where I freakgrew carrots and potatoes and cabbages. She freakdied after seven years freakfighting lung cancer. I never freakremarried. Freakbring up our second child,freaktell her freakstories of our freaklived freaklife. A Littlelife Littleborn to this littleworld this littleearth I littlelearned  in school, met a lasswho said she was littleready  to be littlewed, so we littlemarried after three months of littlecourting. She littlebore our first kidafter six months whilst I littleworked In littleemployment littleexpected littlepromoted to littlemanager  so we littlebought our first littlehome,littlefurnitured it, after littledecorating. I had an littleallottment where I littlegrew carrots and potatoes and cabbages. She littledied after seven years littlefighting lung cancer. I never littlemarried. Littlebring up our second child,littletell her littlestories of our littlelived littlelife. A Madlife  Madborn to this madworld this madearth I madlearned  in school, met a lasswho said she was madready  to be madwed, so we madmarried after three months of madcourting. she madbore our first kidafter six months whilst I madworked  in mademployment madunexpected madpromoted to madmanager  so we madbought our first madhome,madfurnitured it, after maddecorating. I had an madallottment where I madgrew carrots and potatoes and cabbages. She maddied after seven years madfighting lung cancer. I never madremarried. Madbring up our second child,madtell her madstories of our madlived madlife. The Smartlife Smartborn to this smartworldthis smartearth I smartlearned in school, met a lasswho said she was smartready to be smartwed, so we smartmarriedafter three months of smartcourting she smartbore our first kidafter six months whilst I smartworked in smartemployment smartexpectedSmartpromoted to smartmanager  so we smartnought our first smarthome,Smartfurnitured it, after smartdecorating. I had an smartallottment where I smartgrewcarrots and potatoes and cabbages. She smartdied after seven years smartfightinglung cancer. I never smartmarried. Smartbring up our second child,smarttell her smartstories of our smartlived smartlife. My Screenlife Screenborn to this screenworld this screenearth I screenlearned  in school, met a lasswho said she was screenready  to be screenwed, so we screenmarried after three months of screencourting. She screenbore our first kidafter six months whilst I screenworked  in screenemployment screenunexpected screenpromoted to screenmanager  so we screenbought our first screenhome, screenfurnitured it, after screendecorating. I had an screenallottment where I screengrew carrots and potatoes and cabbages. She screendied after seven years screenfighting lung cancer. I never screenremarried. Screenbring up our second child,screentell her screenstories of our screenlived screenlife. A Dreamlife Dreamborn to this dreamworld this dreamearth I dreamlearned in school, met a lasswho said she was dreamready to be dreamwed, so we dreammarriedafter three months of dreamcourting she dreambore our first kidafter six months whilst I dreamworked in dreamemployment dreamunexpected dreampromoted to dreammanager  so we dreambought our first dreamhome,dreamfurnitured it, after dreamdecorating. I had a dreamallottment where I dreamgrew carrots and potatoes and cabbages. She dreamdied after seven years dreamfighting lung cancer. I never dreamremarried. Dreambring up our second child,dreamtell her dreamstories of our dreamlived dreamlife.
title: The Template (Seven Poems)
